font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v.合并,融合 to unite into a whole: fuse
【例】Different units co-alesced into one army 不同的党派融合成了一支部队
【近】associate, coalesce, combine, conjoin, connect, couple, fuse, interfuse, join, link (up), unify, unite
【反】break up, dissever, section, separate, sever, split, sunder, unlink, disband 分开，解散
【记】 coal 煤是由植物，土，石头等结合而成
